name: Sungyoon (Grant) Cho
bio: Hi, I’m Grant Cho! I am a junior studying aerospace engineering. I am the Director for EOB this year and I am more than excited to serve this position. On campus, I also served as an orientation leader for the New Student Programs so I am looking forward to connect with more future Illini and share my experiences with Grainger engineering. In my free time, I like to play golf, go hang out with friends, and watch Bob Ross videos!

name: Matthew Hokinson
bio: Hi, I'm Matt! I'm a Masters student in Computer Science, and I'll be working as a Shadow-An-Engineer chair on EOB. I'm interested in System Programming and Security, and am a TA for Distributed Systems. In my free time I really enjoy cooking, running, and reading.

name: Rene Mohammadi
bio: Hello, I'm Rene! I'm a sophomore in Mechanical Engineering on a PreMed track, and I will be one of the Shadow-an-Engineer coordinators this year! My hobbies include playing a variety of instruments, cooking, and reading!

name: Mary Ehmann
bio: Hi, I’m Mary! I am a senior majoring in Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering with a minor in Molecular and Cellular Biology. Some of my hobbies include baking, hiking and traveling. This year I’m looking forward to connecting students to Engineering at UIUC!

name: Ariya Patel
bio: Hello! My name is Ariya Patel (she/her), and I am a junior in Industrial Engineering. I am the External Outreach Chair for EOB! On campus, I am involved with Engineering Council as the DSAC Director and on EOB, EXPO, and Professional Development. I also am involved with Women in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Phi Chi Theta Professional Business Fraternity! I have loved working alongside a diverse and hard-working group of students. I look forward to what the next year holds!

name: Joie Gindorf
bio: Hi! My name is Joie Gindorf and I am a junior in Civil Engineering. I am super excited to be involved in Engineering Council this year. I also serve on the SITE committee. I am a very proud Illini and love sharing my school spirit! My hobbies include playing golf and arts and crafts. I’m looking forward to an incredible semester!

name: Leah Beran
bio: Hi, I'm Leah (she/her)! I am a senior studying Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering. My position in EOB is Internal Publicity Chair. About me: I am a light-hearted, science-loving, fun-seeking Illini. I can’t wait to share my experiences at Illinois with future Grainger Engineers. Outside of the classroom, I like to adventure and try new things, catch up with friends over coffee, and pet all the dogs on campus!

name: Elizabeth Farah
bio: Hi! My name is Elizabeth Farah. I’m a sophomore in Industrial Engineering. Outside of EOB, I’m also on Engineering Councils SITE and EOH committees, as well as the Outreach Committee for SWE. In my free time, I like to rollerblade, listen to music, and grab food with friends.

name: Jacob Milo
bio: Hi, I'm Jacob (he/him). I am a senior studying Chemical Engineering. I like playing tennis and basketball outside of EOB. I'm excited to answer any questions you have about engineering at UIUC!
